name: Hidden Frog
summary:
After falling from your pond at the top of the tower you must climb your way back up! With only a rocket launcher and your sick jumps see how fast you can make it back up!

HiddenFrog is a relaxing tower climber game where you play as a frog who has fallen off of his island at the top of the tower. Use launchpads and wall runs to help you climb the tower.
